text: @Team_Mitch @realDonaldTrump COVID-19 PANDEMIC, worst deficit in history, worst economy in history, Russia put a bounty on our troops. What does team dipshit do? They worry about statues. Most of which are for confederate traitors. These 2 really have to go.
